BOSN.SW.summary: Bossard Holding AG distributes fasteners, and provides related engineering and logistics services in Europe, the United States, and Asia. The company offers socket products; hex head screws and flange bolts; nuts and inserts; bolts and plugs; slotted, cross recessed, assembled, self-tapping, self-drilling, thread forming, and wood screws; machine screws, threaded rods, slotted set screws, and hose clamps; washers and securing elements; pins, rivets, and keys; fasteners in various materials; coatings; and standard machine elements. It also provides extrusion parts, turned and milled parts, and punched and bent parts. The company was founded in 1831 and is headquartered in Zug, Switzerland.

DAE.SW.summary: DÃ¤twyler Holding AG provides elastomer components for health care, mobility, oil and gas, and food and beverage industries worldwide. The company operates in two divisions, Sealing Solutions and Technical Components. The Sealing Solutions division supplies rubber components for health care applications; sealing components for brake systems, fuel and engine management products, exhaust gas after treatment products, comfort and safety equipment, and electromobility applications; sealing components and O-rings; sealing components for power tools; sealing solutions for portioned food and beverages; and sealing profiles for tunnel construction, civil engineering and building construction applications. The Technical Components division engages in distribution of electronics, PC, and network technology products, home automation, and computer accessories. The company was founded in 1915 and is based in Altdorf, Switzerland. DÃ¤twyler Holding AG is a subsidiary of Pema Holding AG.
